title: Audit Picker Accuracy
description: A manager wants to review the accuracy rates for individual pickers over the last week.

tasks.description: Generate the 'Picker Performance Report' for the previous week.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is generated showing data for all pickers.

tasks.description: The report shows each picker's total picks, lines picked per hour, and accuracy rate (based on audit results and reported errors).
tasks.expected_outcome: The report contains all the relevant KPIs.

tasks.description: The manager identifies one picker with a low accuracy rate of 96% and schedules them for retraining.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager uses the data to take a specific action to improve performance.
